video_prompt: City lights shimmer and distort across rippling water. A large vessel glides through the foreground, followed by smaller boats silently navigating the vibrant reflections. Subtle cloud formations shift above the glowing skyline.
image_prompt: Vibrant, colorful, digital painting of a futuristic cityscape at night. Prominent body of water in the foreground reflecting city lights in dynamic, impressionistic brushstrokes. Tall, sleek skyscraper and spired building dominate the glowing skyline of blues, purples, and oranges. Deep blue night sky with subtle textures. Water surface shimmers with iridescent magenta, purple, turquoise, and electric blue reflections. Large, lit boat and silhouetted sailboat on the water. Bustling, modern city alive with light and color, emphasizing urban reflections, creating a fantastical, dreamlike atmosphere.
refined_video_prompt: Water continually ripples, causing city lights to undulate and streak across the surface. A large vessel steadily glides into view, traversing the foreground, as smaller boats navigate the vibrant, shifting reflections in its wake. Subtle cloud formations drift and reshape against the glowing skyline.
